name: Monkey Climb
description:
Monkey Climb

IOS Game

Target Age: Kids and Teens

ESRB: E

Game Summary: Bobo the monkey  need to get to the evil king of the jungle and take the gold star back. Bobo(the player) must climb the tallest tree going through many different obstacles and evil bees who defend Posier to get to her and take her back. Bobo must complete this before he destroys the jungle.

Game Outline: Bobo goes to the tallest tree in the jungle and begins to climb. In this game, the only game mechanic is jumping and moving. He will use that to get up the tree. On each branch/platform he jumps on to, there will be various evil bees he must jump on in order to kill and different obstacles he must pass through. There are about 5 different platforms/branches.  Will Bobo be able to get to her before she is his forever?

USP:

  • 55 levels to complete.
  • Will you make it in time to save the jungle?
  • Challenging obstacles and defenders on each level.
  • Fun characters.
  • Based in the jungle for a fun environment.
  • Great for all ages!

Similar Competitive Products:

Jump King and Super Mario
